name: Order for Two
description:
A single-player platformer designed for all player types. You must control two avatars simultaneously in an effort to solve puzzles, climb platforms and have fun! Reach the top of the stage on time to successfully deliver the pizza. 

We made this as a 4 week-long prototyping project for class and had a lot of fun developing the game. We hope you enjoy playing it too!

Keep calm and remember: Its Pizza Time!
